pull.title: Switch scheduler to steady_clock
pull.body: There is already `mockscheduler`, so it seems brittle, confusing and redundant to be able to mock the scheduler by adjusting the system clock.

events.body:
Concept ACK, this is a classic usecase for steady_clock.

I don't think it's purely a refactor though.
